content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Copper Plate Mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3)

### Electricity Generator at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position x1)
- Boiler (position y)
- Offshore pump (position z)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting and resources
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items.
- Regularly check the status of your furnaces to confirm they have the required fuel and ingredients.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
